services-dis.title: Performance Upgrade
services-dis.description: Enhance your vehicle's performance with our professional upgrade services.
services-dis.benefits: Improved speed, power, and overall vehicle performance.

services-dis.title: Break Repair & Service
services-dis.description: Trust us to keep your brakes in top-notch condition for your safety.
services-dis.benefits: Reliable and safe braking performance for your vehicle.

services-dis.title: Engine Service & Repair
services-dis.description: Keep your engine running smoothly with our professional service and repair solutions.

services-dis.title: Tyre & Wheels
services-dis.description: Ensure your vehicle's stability and safety with our tire and wheel services.
services-dis.benefits: Improved traction, handling, and tire longevity.

services-dis.title: Power & Energy
services-dis.description: Explore energy-efficient and eco-friendly solutions for your vehicle's power needs.
services-dis.benefits: Reduce environmental impact and save on energy costs.

services-dis.title: Denting & Painting
services-dis.description: Restore the appearance of your vehicle with our expert denting and painting services.
services-dis.benefits: Aesthetic improvements and protection against corrosion.

services-dis.title: General Service & Washing
services-dis.description: Give your vehicle a complete service and a sparkling clean wash.
services-dis.benefits: Regular maintenance and a fresh, clean look for your vehicle.
